isis.stitle: 530 and DT-466/408 Diesel Engine Service (1994) - ROCKER ARM ASSEMBLY, CAMSHAFT, TAPPETS AND PUSH RODS - ROCKER ARM ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION

important.para: THE ROCKER ARM ASSEMBLY CANNOT BE REMOVED AND REINSTALLED WITHOUT COMPLETE REMOVAL OF THE CYLINDER HEAD. REMOVAL OF THE SIX CYLINDER HEAD BOLTS MAY BREAK THE CYLINDER HEAD GASKET SEAL. TO INSURE THE PROPER GASKET SEAL, A NEW CYLINDER HEAD GASKET SHOULD BE INSTALLED AND ALL CYLINDER HEAD BOLTS BE TORQUED IN SEQUENCE, AS OUTLINED IN SECTION 4.

step1.para: Install the valve lever assembly as outlined in Section 4 " CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES".
Adjust valve lash as outlined in Section 4 "CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES".
Reinstall the valve cover/intake manifold and crankcase breather tube as an assembly. Refer to Section 3 for further information.
